channel.title: University of California-Irvine (R-116)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Ltr to all research & test reactor licensees requesting that Reg Guide 2.6 (for comment) & ANSI/ANS-15.16 (Draft II dtd 811129) be used to meet requirement of final amend to 10CFR50.54(r) re emergency planning.FR notice encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Provides info that has become available since revised 10CFR20 became effective on 910620 & forwards two press releases re issuance & implementation of revised part 20.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards FR notice & press release re proposed addl safeguards for research reactors.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Generic ltr to all research & test reactor licensees re current status of revised guidance criteria for research & test reactor emergency planning.FR notice published 811231, amends dates & associated power levels for emergency plans.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: PNO-V-90-019:on 900417,earthquakes measuring 4.6 on Richter Scale measured 3 miles west of Upland,CA.On 900418,three earthquakes occurred in northern California.No visual damage occurred to reactors in area.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: PNO-V-90-008:on 900228,earthquake w/Richter magnitude of 5.5 occurred near Upland,CA.San Onofre declared unusual event & conducted insp.Area research reactors shut down w/no damage resulting to facilities.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)
